channel.title: Hiring: Linux Distribution Developers!
channel.description:
Originally published at: https://www.whonix.org/blog/linux-distribution-developers
Whonix has found a sponsor. Details will be announced later. We are hiring Linux Distribution Developers! - programming / scripting skills - Any or multiple of the following languages: linux shell scripting, python, C, C++, perhaps others - git Bonus, non-mandatory requirements: - Have a history of Open Source development. Other notes: - Academic degrees are great, but not required. - We only write Libre / Free and Open Source software, and we don't believe in software patents. How to apply: - Unbureaucratic. - No CV required. (But feel free to submit one.) - Link to a sample of projects worked on in the past that you're allowed to show us. - Add your salary expectation. - Add your availability. - Add how many weekly hours you prefer. - Email the above to Patrick Schleizer, adrelanos@riseup.net All submissions will be handled confidential.

item.title: Hiring: Linux Distribution Developers!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
FunderQ1999:

So is there an announcement to make about this unnamed sponsor?

Status is still the same as here:
Hiring: Linux Distribution Developers!

At this point I doubt it will move forward.

I regret having made this public too early since now it badly reflects. So now even if it does work, it’s best to restart the announcement.

FunderQ1999:

It seems there was recently an unannounced announcement on the Whonix.org homepage of disclosing who this new unnamed official sponsor is?

“The official sponsor of Whonix is EyeOnPASS.com - An API solution for websites and applications that prevents credential stuffing attacks on their user’s accounts.”

This is a different sponsor.

FunderQ1999:

It would be good for Whonix users to know more information about this company, where they are from, and the type of arrangement of influence they have upon Whonix, how much and how long or often they are contributing for, and any influence on hiring of developers, writing code, suggesting features and so on.

Just now answered in separate thread:
https://forums.whonix.org/t/eyeonpass-com-sponsorship

Read full topic

item.title: Hiring: Linux Distribution Developers!
item.dc:creator: FunderQ1999
item.description:
So is there an announcement to make about this unnamed sponsor?

It seems there was recently an unannounced announcement on the Whonix.org homepage of disclosing who this new unnamed official sponsor is?

“The official sponsor of Whonix is EyeOnPASS.com - An API solution for websites and applications that prevents credential stuffing attacks on their user’s accounts.”

It would be good for Whonix users to know more information about this company, where they are from, and the type of arrangement of influence they have upon Whonix, how much and how long or often they are contributing for, and any influence on hiring of developers, writing code, suggesting features and so on.

Read full topic

item.title: Hiring: Linux Distribution Developers!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Patrick:

Whonix has found a sponsor.

Update: things moving very slowly. Don’t hold your breath for this. I will let you know should there be any news for this unnamed sponsor or any other potential future sponsor.

Read full topic

item.title: Hiring: Linux Distribution Developers!
item.dc:creator: onion_knight
item.description:
Good news indeed! Keep up the good work!

Read full topic

item.title: Hiring: Linux Distribution Developers!
item.dc:creator: torjunkie
item.description:
Patrick:

Whonix has found a sponsor. Details will be announced later.

We are hiring Linux Distribution Developers!

Are you in a position to tell the community more about this? It is an exciting development, particularly if developers can be engaged to tackle outstanding issues or enhancements for Whonix.

Hopefully you held onto some of those bitcoins and enjoyed the vertical price rise in recent times!

Read full topic

item.title: Hiring: Linux Distribution Developers!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Originally published at: https://www.whonix.org/blog/linux-distribution-developers

Whonix has found a sponsor. Details will be announced later.

We are hiring Linux Distribution Developers!

  • programming / scripting skills
  • Any or multiple of the following languages: linux shell scripting, python, C, C++, perhaps others
  • git

Bonus, non-mandatory requirements:

  • Have a history of Open Source development.

Other notes:

  • Academic degrees are great, but not required.
  • We only write Libre / Free and Open Source software, and we don’t believe in software patents.

How to apply:

  • Unbureaucratic.
  • No CV required. (But feel free to submit one.)
  • Link to a sample of projects worked on in the past that you’re allowed to show us.
  • Add your salary expectation.
  • Add your availability.
  • Add how many weekly hours you prefer.
  • Email the above to Patrick Schleizer, adrelanos@riseup.net

All submissions will be handled confidential.

Read full topic
